SEARCH
Package SharedWebInterfaces.SharedInterfaces

Interface ServerControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Traslator
All Known Implementing Classes:
ModelTranslator
public interface ServerControllerInterface extends Traslator
The interface Server controller interface. This interface is used to define the methods that the client can perform on the serverController through the messages sent.
